Writer and baker Zoe Denenberg tried to go vegan for Ben, the guy she had a crush on, but it didn’t get her the result she was hoping for. Read Zoe’s essay about what she learned instead, and listen to Zoe and Ben get real with each other on this week’s episode of the Healthyish podcast.ContentThis content can also be viewed on the site it originates from.Stuff we talk about in this episodeI Went Vegan for Love—And I Won’t Do It AgainHow to ListenListen to this episode through the audio player on this page or subscribe via Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you get your podcasts to get all six episodes.
